title: (x) Peter Stamm "An Einem Tag Wie Dieser" book cover - Ottomat {Mark Christensen}
content:
On the risk of making a fool of myself, can someone plase id this sans face for me (“Peter Stamm” and “An einem Tag wie diesem”), as i don’t think i know it, or just can’t recognize it. Especially the bent-down horizintal on the UC A made me wonder…

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235956im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ID_stamm_6230.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Magen Vital" Thesis lookalike - FF Zwo {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235956/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27543 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Barclays Classic corporate face - custom typeface {Fredrik Andersson} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235956/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27525 "Go to next forum topic")
author: franzheidl

comments.content:
Hey there

Could it be Ottomat??

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/ottomat/book/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080724235956/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/ottomat/book/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/ottomat/book/")

Cheers

Looks like a match to me…  
many thanks!
